channel.title: Comments on: T-SQL Tuesday #44: The second chance
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Hey Bradley, thanks for reading! I usually use my "down periods" with less work now for reading, community work and taking certifications exams. Much more productive :)
item.content:encoded: Hey Bradley, thanks for reading! I usually use my “down periods” with less work now for reading, community work and taking certifications exams. Much more productive ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Bradley Ball (@SQLBalls)
item.dc:creator: Bradley Ball (@SQLBalls)
item.description: Hey Koen great blog, time lost is one of the great regrets. I had something like this occur, the first time I cannot remember how I spent my time (but it was not productive). The second time around I used that down time to study for and get my SQL 2005 certifications. To me that second chance was life changing :)
item.content:encoded: Hey Koen great blog, time lost is one of the great regrets. I had something like this occur, the first time I cannot remember how I spent my time (but it was not productive). The second time around I used that down time to study for and get my SQL 2005 certifications. To me that second chance was life changing ðŸ™‚
